document.full_text: premiums for new federal health insurance plans that cover high-risk people with pre-existing conditions will drop by as much as 40 percent, federal health regulators said on tuesday.
document.title: u.s. cuts premiums for high-risk health plan
lines_and_colors: premiums for new federal health insurance plans that cover high-risk people with pre-existing conditions will drop by as much as 40 percent, federal health regulators said on tuesday.
